name.japanese: ヒューマンオークション会場

significantEvents.description: Guards attack the Straw Hats after Luffy's assault on Charlos.
significantEvents.significance: The auction house becomes a battlefield between pirates and guards.

significantEvents.description: Marines surround the auction house in response to the Celestial Dragon assault.
significantEvents.significance: Demonstrates the World Government's rapid response to protect World Nobles.

significantEvents.description: Rayleigh uses Conqueror's Haki to knock out enemies in the auction hall.
significantEvents.significance: Site of the first demonstration of precise Conqueror's Haki control.

description: A large auction hall on Sabaody Archipelago where humans and other beings are sold as slaves. The building features a main auction floor with seating for spectators and a stage with backstage areas.
